Package com.tloj.game.entities.npcs

Class Smith

java.lang.Object
com.tloj.game.entities.Entity
com.tloj.game.entities.FriendlyEntity
com.tloj.game.entities.npcs.Smith
All Implemented Interfaces:
ItemReceiverEntity
public class Smith extends FriendlyEntity implements ItemReceiverEntity
Represents a Smith NPC in the game.
The Smith can upgrade the player's weapon with a WeaponShard.
